group_1.textLeft: Mom, do you know anything about this?
Why do we have merchandise from a Joey movie@in our house?
The only people who could get these are@people who knew the guy!

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, I'm familiar with them.
...Do you happen to know Director Joey's@real name?
Well, his last name is nowhere close to@"Yamada"...
But for "Joey," he just changed the@pronunciation of his actual first name.
See, the kanji for "star" can also be read@as "jou".
Yes. Director Joey's real name was "Seiichi,"@spelt with "star" and the number "one".
He was the brother of your father... Seiji@Mihono... and your uncle, Seira.
Your father used to be a cameraman, you see.
He was actually a crew member on Seiichi-san's@films.

group_1.textLeft: B-but wait a second?! Uncle Seiichi...@Committed suicide, right?
Oh... oh, I see. ...That's why there hasn't@been a new Joey movie in ages...
And... I guess the reason I saw his films when@I was little was because...

group_1.textRight: ...I'm afraid so.
Back in the day, he had a reputation for his@unique directorial sense...
And his films got a lot of impressive reviews,@even though he was a minor name.
But... production funding turned out to be a@big obstacle for him.
He was young, and had a lot to look forward@to, but...
For instance, at one time, the lead actor in one@of his films happened to cause a big scandal.
And another time, a film of his was@restricted...
...Because it was too similar to a real@incident that happened afterward...
After a while of that sort of thing happening,@nobody wanted to sponsor him any more.

group_1.textLeft: What! But none of that stuff would've been@Uncle Seiichi's fault!

group_1.textRight: From there, he became quite depressed, and...
...He eventually took his own life.
So, as you might expect, your father put down@his camera...
...And swore to never have anything to do with@film again.
All of it happened when you were three years@old.
Do you think you can understand where your@father's coming from, at least a little...?
What should we do, I wonder...

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna go talk to Dad again.
